snippet.title: Party, Darling? - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ PARTY, DARLING? IS OFFICIALLY OUT! ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ https://sweetheartsquad.itch.io/party... ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥

"Party, Darling?" is a narrative adventure game developed with S-Tengine 2, the SweetHeart Squad's custom C++ and OpenGL-based open source engine. The game revolves around a murder mystery, where the player must explore the alternate realities of a bizarre mansion in search of its mysterious owner, Omar Clean. Help or hinder the quirky characters you meet as you explore a potentially infinite number of procedurally generated mansions!

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥

Keep in touch:

sweetheartsquad.com
sweetheartsquad.itch.io
sweetheartsquad.tumblr.com
twitter.com/sweetheartsquad
